verses.verse: In the eighth <S%H8066><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, in the second <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius <S%H1867><s%>, came the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> unto Zechariah <S%H2148><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berechiah <S%H1296><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Iddo <S%H5714><s%>, the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was sore <S%H7110><s%> displeased <S%H7107><s%> with your fathers <S%H1><s%>.

Therefore say <S%H559><s%> thou unto them <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>: Return <S%H7725><s%> unto me <S%H5002><s%>, saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, and I will return <S%H7725><s%> unto you <S%H559><s%>, saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.

Be ye not as your fathers <S%H1><s%>, unto whom the former <S%H7223><s%> prophets <S%H5030><s%> cried <S%H7121><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, Return <S%H7725><s%> ye now from your evil <S%H7451><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%>, and from your evil <S%H7451><s%> doings <S%H4611><s%>: but they did not hear <S%H8085><s%>, nor hearken <S%H7181><s%> unto me <S%H5002><s%>, saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Your fathers <S%H1><s%>, where are they <S%H5030><s%>? and the prophets, do they live <S%H2421><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>?

But my words <S%H1697><s%> and my statutes <S%H2706><s%>, which I commanded <S%H6680><s%> my servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%>, did they not overtake <S%H5381><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%>? and they turned <S%H7725><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>, Like as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> thought <S%H2161><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> unto us <S%H1870><s%>, according to our ways, and according to our doings <S%H4611><s%>, so hath he dealt with us <S%H6213><s%>.

Upon the four <S%H702><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, which is the month <S%H2320><s%> Shebat <S%H7627><s%>, in the second <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius <S%H1867><s%>, came the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> unto Zechariah <S%H2148><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berechiah <S%H1296><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Iddo <S%H5714><s%>, the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

I saw <S%H7200><s%> in the night <S%H3915><s%>, and <S%H376><s%>, behold, a man riding <S%H7392><s%> upon a red <S%H122><s%> horse <S%H5483><s%>, and he stood <S%H5975><s%> among the myrtle-trees <S%H1918><s%> that were in the bottom <S%H4699><s%>; and behind <S%H310><s%> him there were horses <S%H5483><s%>, red <S%H122><s%>, sorrel <S%H8320><s%>, and white <S%H3836><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> I <S%H113><s%>, O my lord, what are these <S%H4397><s%>? And the angel that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H7200><s%>, I will show thee what these are.

And the man <S%H376><s%> that stood <S%H5975><s%> among the myrtle-trees <S%H1918><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>, These are they whom Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath sent <S%H7971><s%> to walk <S%H1980><s%> to and fro through the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And they answered <S%H6030><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> that stood <S%H5975><s%> among the myrtle-trees <S%H1918><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, We have walked to and fro <S%H1980><s%> through the earth <S%H776><s%>, and <S%H776><s%>, behold, all the earth sitteth still <S%H3427><s%>, and is at rest <S%H8252><s%>.

Then the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, how long wilt thou not have mercy <S%H7355><s%> on Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and on the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, against which thou hast had indignation <S%H2194><s%> these threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>?

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me with good <S%H2896><s%> words <S%H1697><s%>, even comfortable <S%H5150><s%> words <S%H1697><s%>.

So the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H7121><s%>, Cry thou <S%H559><s%>, saying, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>: I am jealous <S%H7065><s%> for Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and for Zion <S%H6726><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> jealousy <S%H7068><s%>.

And I am very <S%H1419><s%> sore <S%H7110><s%> displeased <S%H7107><s%> with the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are at ease <S%H7600><s%>; for I was but a little <S%H4592><s%> displeased <S%H7107><s%>, and they helped <S%H5826><s%> forward the affliction <S%H7451><s%>.

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: I am returned <S%H7725><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> with mercies <S%H7356><s%>; my house <S%H1004><s%> shall be built <S%H1129><s%> in it <S%H5002><s%>, saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, and a line <S%H6957><s%> shall be stretched forth <S%H5186><s%> over Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

Cry <S%H7121><s%> yet again <S%H559><s%>, saying, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>: My cities <S%H5892><s%> shall yet overflow <S%H6327><s%> with prosperity <S%H2896><s%>; and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall yet comfort <S%H5162><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%>, and shall yet choose <S%H977><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.
And I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and saw <S%H7200><s%>, and <S%H702><s%>, behold, four horns <S%H7161><s%>.

And I said <S%H559><s%> unto the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me <S%H559><s%>, What are these? And he answered me <S%H7161><s%>, These are the horns which have scattered <S%H2219><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%>, Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> showed <S%H7200><s%> me four <S%H702><s%> smiths <S%H2796><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> I <S%H935><s%>, What come these to do <S%H6213><s%>? And he spake <S%H559><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, These are the horns <S%H7161><s%> which scattered <S%H2219><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%>, so that <S%H6310><s%> no man <S%H376><s%> did lift up <S%H5375><s%> his head <S%H7218><s%>; but these are come <S%H935><s%> to terrify <S%H2729><s%> them <S%H3034><s%>, to cast down the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>, which lifted up <S%H5375><s%> their horn <S%H7161><s%> against the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> to scatter it <S%H2219><s%>.
